definitions.text: an act of honor or courteous recognition
examples: a musical salute to the composer on his birthday

definitions.text: a formal military gesture of respect
an act of greeting with friendly words and gestures like bowing or lifting the hat

examples: Let us toast the birthday girl!
Let's drink to the New Year
I meet this men every day on my way to work and he salutes me
a terrible stench saluted our nostrils

definitions.text: honor with a military ceremony, as when honoring dead soldiers
recognize with a gesture prescribed by a military regulation; assume a prescribed position
examples: When the officers show up, the soldiers have to salute
